text: Heinz Friedrich Ruppert Riesenhuber (born 1 December 1935) is a German politician. He is a member of the CDU. He was Minister of Scientific Research under Chancellor Helmut Kohl from 1982 to 1993. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography on the Website of the German Bundestag Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Education ministers of Germany Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:Politicians from Frankfurt
title: Heinz Riesenhuber
